newsitem.title: PORTUGAL: Portugal's S.Costa denies deal with T.Duarte.
newsitem.headline: Portugal's S.Costa denies deal with T.Duarte.

text.p: Portuguese construction group Soares da Costa denied a press report about a possible sale of the group to another Portuguese builder Teixeira Duarte, an official source said.
"The board of Soares da Costa denies the news about the sale of the company to Teixeira Duarte," the source told Reuters.
Semanario Economico weekly newspaper reported on Friday that Teixeira Duarte was believed to have agreed on Thursday with shareholders of Soares da Costa to buy their stakes in the company.
The Lisbon bourse interrupted trade in Soares da Costa shares after the newspaper report, a bourse spokesman said.
